Boromar Smuggler.name: Boromar Smuggler
Boromar Smuggler.description: Smugglers employed by the Boromar Clan (mostly halflings) are notoriously hard to catch. These speedy criminals traffic everything from narcotics to illegal arcane weaponry across Sharn.

Hustle.name: Hustle
Hustle.description: The smuggler can move through the space of any creature that is of a larger size, but it can’t stop there.

Boromar Underboss.name: Boromar Underboss
Boromar Underboss.description: Underbosses supervise larger clan operations, such as gambling halls and warehouses of smuggled goods awaiting transport. Accustomed to the criminal lifestyle, these hardy individuals (mostly halflings) dismiss and dispose of threats with calculated ease.

Hustle.name: Hustle
Hustle.description: The underboss can move through the space of any creature that is of a larger size, but it can’t stop there.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The underboss makes three attacks, using [[/item Poisoned Blade]] or [[/item Arcane Firearm]] in any combination.

Poisoned Blade.name: Poisoned Blade
Poisoned Blade.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], , and the target has the &Reference[poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the underboss’s next turn.

If the target is already Poisoned, it instead takes an extra [[/damage 2d6 poison average]] damage.

Arcane Firearm.name: Arcane Firearm
Arcane Firearm.description: Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], range 30/90 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Uncanny Dodge.name: 直觉闪避
Uncanny Dodge.description: 触发：[[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=NzfYZzkrG4qJ13to]]。响应：[[lookup @name lowercase]]因此次攻击受到的伤害减半（向下取整）。

Cannith Artificer.name: Cannith Artificer
Cannith Artificer.description: Dragonmarked artificers of House Cannith (typically human) often wield compact devices similar to eldritch cannons that can produce a variety of devastating effects. Both these cannons and the artificers’ force-empowered maces function only in their creator’s hands.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The artificer casts one of the following spells, using its Tinker’s Tools as an Arcane Focus and using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: [[/item .cnBfV3qxvNQsyJsM]]{Burning Hands} (level 3 version), [[/item .XD8Gy2vRWeYTzh31]]{Mending}, [[/item .nw9acHOzE7yX8PNU]]{Thunderwave} (level 3 version)

1/Day Each: [[/item .FUqWZjulAC5m5ABv]]{Cure Wounds}, [[/item .WQT2BWnq07J5fWSs]]{Invisibility}

Burning Hands.name: 燃烧之手
Burning Hands.description:
你向前喷射出一片火焰。处于 15 尺锥状区域内的生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免。豁免失败者受到 [[/damage 3d6 type=fire]]伤害，豁免成功者受到一半伤害。

在此锥状区域内的未被着装或携带的易燃物件会开始燃烧。

升环施法：你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，此法术的伤害就会提升 1d6。

Mending.name: 修复术
Mending.description:
该法术修复你所触碰一个物件上的一处破损或裂缝，例如修复一条断裂的链条、一把碎成两半的钥匙、一件撕裂的斗篷、一个漏了的酒袋等。只要破损或断裂处在任意方向上都不超过 1 尺，你就可以不留痕迹地修复它。

该法术可以物理性地修复一件魔法物品，但无法恢复其上的魔法。

Thunderwave.name: 雷鸣波
Thunderwave.description:
你施放出一道雷鸣能量。在以你为源点 15 尺立方区域内的每名生物必须进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败者将受到 2d8 点雷鸣伤害，并被推离 10 尺。豁免成功则只受一半伤害。

此外，所有完全位于该区域内且未被固定住的物件都将被推离 10 尺。该法术还会发出距你 300 尺内都能听见的雷霆巨响。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，伤害就提高 1d8。

Cure Wounds.name: 疗伤术
Cure Wounds.description:
你触碰的一名生物恢复等同于 2d8 + 你施法属性调整值点生命值。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，治疗量就增加 2d8 点。

Invisibility.name: 隐形术
Invisibility.description:
你触碰的一个生物进入 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 状态并维持至法术终止。如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

materials.value: 一根包裹在阿拉伯胶中的睫毛

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The artificer makes two attacks, using [[/item Battering Mace]] or [[/item Artillery Strike]] in any combination.

Battering Mace.name: Battering Mace
Battering Mace.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Tinker's Tools.name: 修补工具
Tinker's Tools.description:
Ability: Dexterity

Utilize: Assemble a Tiny item composed of scrap, which falls apart in 1 minute (DC 20)

Craft: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepMusket0000]{Musket}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepPistol0000]{Pistol}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagBell0000000]{Bell}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.UkWdyJYQTfVX2cJW]{Bullseye Lantern}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagFlask000000]{Flask}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.wjHtGnd05SPdURqE]{Hooded Lantern}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagHuntingTrap]{Hunting Trap}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagLock0000000]{Lock}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagManacles000]{Manacles}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagMirror00000]{Mirror}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagShovel00000]{Shovel}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagSignalWhist]{Signal Whistle}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}

Assemble a Tiny Item.name: 用废料组装出一个微型物品

Daask Bruiser.name: Daask Bruiser
Daask Bruiser.description: Intimidating and powerful, bruisers lead Daask operations when more violent and decisive shows of force are needed. These enforcers relish the brutality of their work.

Blood Frenzy.name: 血腥狂怒
Blood Frenzy.description: The bruiser has Advantage on attack rolls against any creature that doesn’t have all its Hit Points.

Smackback.name: Smackback
Smackback.description: Trigger: The bruiser takes damage from a creature within 5 feet. Response: The bruiser makes one [[/item Pummel]] attack, targeting the triggering creature.

utility.condition: The bruiser takes damage from a creature within 5 feet

Glare.name: 怒视
Glare.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=onxFr8Slt41qWXfP]], one creature the bruiser can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=onxFr8Slt41qWXfP]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the bruiser’s next turn.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the bruiser’s next turn.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The bruiser makes three [[/item Pummel]] attacks and uses [[/item Glare]].

Daask Raider.name: Daask Raider
Daask Raider.description: Raiders use guerrilla tactics to ambush warehouses and beat down opponents. These skilled fistfighters work in tandem to claim goods and territory for Daask.

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: The raider has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the raider’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.

Smackback.name: Smackback
Smackback.description: Trigger: The raider takes damage from a creature within 5 feet. Response: The raider makes one [[/item Pummel]] attack, targeting the triggering creature.

utility.condition: The raider takes damage from a creature within 5 feet.

Dreaming Dark Infiltrator.name: Dreaming Dark Infiltrator
Dreaming Dark Infiltrator.description: Dreaming Dark infiltrators are spies sent to gather intelligence. They plant psychic seeds in their minds of their foes that enhance the infiltrators’ combat prowess against those enemies.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The infiltrator makes three [[/item Mind Blade]] attacks.

Mind Blade.name: Mind Blade
Mind Blade.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The infiltrator casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

3/Day: [[/item .VUu7ZatCma4LIstF]]{Detect Thoughts}

1/Day: [[/item .efaSynapticStati]]{Synaptic Static}

Mind Curse.name: Mind Curse
Mind Curse.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=P5QryAQht22Yp2wj]], one creature hit by the infiltrator’s Mind Blade attack this turn.

Failure: The target takes [[/damage average]] damage and is cursed.

While cursed in this way, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls against the infiltrator, and the infiltrator always knows its location while it and the infiltrator are on the same plane of existence.

A cursed creature repeats the save whenever it finishes a Short or Long Rest, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Success: Half damage only.

affects.special: hit by the infiltrator’s Mind Blade attack this turn.\

Cursed.name: 诅咒
Cursed.description:
The cursed target has Disadvantage on attack rolls against the infiltrator, and the infiltrator always knows its location while it and the infiltrator are on the same plane of existence.

A cursed creature repeats the save whenever it finishes a Short or Long Rest, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

efaSynapticStati.name: 突触静止
efaSynapticStati.description:
选择施法距离内的一点，你引爆其间的心灵能量。以那一点为中心，半径 20 尺球状区域内的每个生物进行一次智力豁免检定。豁免失败的生物受到 8d6 心灵伤害，成功则伤害减半。

豁免失败的目标也会在接下来的 1 分钟内思想混乱。在此期间，目标每次进行攻击检定、属性检定和为维持专注而进行体质豁免检定时都需要从结果中减去一个 [[/r 1d6]] 。在目标的每个回合结束它都可以重新进行 [[/save ability=int dc=@attributes.spelldc format=long]] 检定，若成功将结束这个效应对自己的影响。

Muddled Thoughts.name: 思维混乱
Muddled Thoughts.description: 你每次进行攻击检定、属性检定和为维持专注而进行体质豁免检定时都需要从结果中减去一个 d6。在施法者的每一回合结束你都可以重新进行[[/save ability=int format=long]]{感知豁免}，若成功将结束此效应对自身的影响。

Dreaming Dark Mindkiller.name: Dreaming Dark Mindkiller
Dreaming Dark Mindkiller.description: Mindkillers are the assassins of the Dreaming Dark, sent to terrify their foes before striking to kill. Mindkillers force foes to attack their own allies, causing physical and emotional devastation to grow the power of the Dreaming Dark.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The mindkiller makes two [[/item Nightmare Whisper]] attacks.

Nightmare Whisper.name: Nightmare Whisper
Nightmare Whisper.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the mindkiller’s next turn. If the target is already Frightened, it instead takes an extra [[/damage 3d6 psychic average]] damage.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the mindkiller’s next turn.

Primal Fear.name: Primal Fear
Primal Fear.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=jStzD14Wkerw0JJQ]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=jStzD14Wkerw0JJQ]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the mindkiller can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=jStzD14Wkerw0JJQ]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the mindkiller’s next turn.

While Frightened in this way, the target can do only one of the following on each of its turns: move, take an action, or take a Bonus Action.

Success: Half damage only.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description:
The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the mindkiller’s next turn.

While Frightened in this way, the target can do only one of the following on each of its turns: move, take an action, or take a Bonus Action.

Slayer’s Puppet.name: Slayer’s Puppet
Slayer’s Puppet.description: The mindkiller casts [[/item .SXJMVNuMMnNlRBRQ]]{Dominate Person}, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]).

Dominate Person.name: 支配类人
Dominate Person.description:
一名法术范围内你可见的类人必须成功于一次感知豁免，否则在持续时间内陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态。若你或你的盟友正在与其战斗，则目标在此豁免上具有优势。目标受到伤害时，可以重复进行豁免，豁免成功则其身上的此法术终止。

该目标被魅惑期间，只要你与其处于同一位面就可以与之保持心灵感应。在你的回合，你可以通过心灵感应命令该生物（无需动作），比如“攻击那个生物”“跑到那个位置”或是“去拿那个物品”。目标完成一项指令却未收到你的进一步指示时，将会凭自身喜好行动，尽可能的保护自己。

你可以用自己的反应去要求目标执行一项反应

升环施法： 使用更高环阶法术位施展时，你的专注能持续更长时间，六环至多 10 分钟，七环至多 1 小时，八环及以上至多 8 小时。

Dominated.name: 支配
Dominated.description: 陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] ，当你受到伤害时，重复 [[/save ability=wis]] 豁免，成功时结束自身身上的法术效应。

Mend Cannon.name: Mend Cannon
Mend Cannon.description: Casting @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMending000]{Mending} on the cannon restores [[/healing]] (Hit Points) to this cannon.

Flame Thrower.name: Flame Thrower
Flame Thrower.description: The cannon blasts fire in a 15-foot Cone. Each creature in that area makes a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC, taking [[/damage]] damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. Flammable objects in the Cone that aren't being worn or carried start burning.

Force Ballista.name: Force Ballista
Force Ballista.description: Make a ranged spell attack originating from the cannon at one creature or object within 120 feet of it. On a hit, the target takes [[/damage]] damage, and if the target is a creature, it is pushed up to 5 feet away from the cannon.

Protector.name: Protector
Protector.description: The cannon emits a burst of positive energy that grants itself and each creature of your choice within 10 feet of the cannon a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to 1d8 plus your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1).

Emerald Claw Commander.name: Emerald Claw Commander
Emerald Claw Commander.description: Emerald Claw commanders lead large groups of soldiers, inspiring the fanatical devotion of Humanoids and Undead alike.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The commander makes two attacks, using [[/item Flail]] or [[/item Javelin]] in any combination.

Javelin.name: 标枪
Javelin.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]—plus [[/damage 2d6 necrotic average]] damage if the commander is Bloodied.

Plate Armor.name: 板甲
Plate Armor.description: 板甲由覆盖全身，且相互连接的模铸金属板组成。一套板甲包括护手、重皮靴、一顶附面甲的头盔以及在护甲底层的厚重的布甲。其锁扣和皮带结构可以将护甲重量分配到身体各处。

Shield.name: 护盾术
Shield.description: 盾牌通常由木材或金属制成，可以单手进行持用。持用一面盾牌可以令你的护甲等级 +2。不过同一时间里你只能从一面盾牌中受益。

Aura of Authority.name: 威权灵光
Aura of Authority.description: While in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=pxqN659aktxgUrcj]]-foot Emanation originating from the commander, the commander and its allies have Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws, provided the commander doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.

Flail.name: 链枷
Flail.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]—plus [[/damage 2d6 necrotic average]] damage if the commander is Bloodied—and the target has Disadvantage on its next attack roll before the start of the commander’s next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that can be used as a reminder but does not automate the above benefits.

Attack Disadvantage.name: Attack Disadvantage
Attack Disadvantage.description: The target has Disadvantage on its next attack roll before the start of the commander’s next turn.

Emerald Claw Knight.name: Emerald Claw Knight
Emerald Claw Knight.description: Knights of the Emerald Claw command squads of Humanoid or Undead soldiers. As they draw nearer to death, the chill of the grave suffuses their weapon attacks.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The knight makes two attacks, using [[/item Flail]] or [[/item Javelin]] in any combination.

Flail.name: 链枷
Flail.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]—plus [[/damage 1d8 necrotic average]] damage if the knight is &Reference[Bloodied]—and the target has Disadvantage on its next attack roll before the start of the knight’s next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that can be used as a reminder but does not automate the above benefits.

Attack Disadvantage.name: Attack Disadvantage
Attack Disadvantage.description: The target has Disadvantage on its next attack roll before the start of the commander’s next turn.

Javelin.name: 标枪
Javelin.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]—plus [[/damage 1d8 necrotic average]] damage if the knight is &Reference[Bloodied].

Chain Mail.name: 链甲
Chain Mail.description: 该护甲由互相锁接的金属环编成。链甲还包括在甲胄下面穿戴的一层织物衬里，用以阻止擦伤并减缓挥击的冲击。此护甲同时还附有护手。

Shield.name: 护盾术
Shield.description: 盾牌通常由木材或金属制成，可以单手进行持用。持用一面盾牌可以令你的护甲等级 +2。不过同一时间里你只能从一面盾牌中受益。

Mend Cannon.name: Mend Cannon
Mend Cannon.description: Casting @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMending000]{Mending} on the cannon restores [[/healing]] (Hit Points) to this cannon.

Flame Thrower.name: Flame Thrower
Flame Thrower.description: The cannon blasts fire in a 15-foot Cone. Each creature in that area makes a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC, taking [[/damage]] damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. Flammable objects in the Cone that aren't being worn or carried start burning.

Force Ballista.name: Force Ballista
Force Ballista.description: Make a ranged spell attack originating from the cannon at one creature or object within 120 feet of it. On a hit, the target takes [[/damage]] damage, and if the target is a creature, it is pushed up to 5 feet away from the cannon.

Protector.name: Protector
Protector.description: The cannon emits a burst of positive energy that grants itself and each creature of your choice within 10 feet of the cannon a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to 1d8 plus your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1).

Detonate.name: Detonate
Detonate.description: When your cannon takes damage, you can take a Reaction to command the cannon to detonate if you are within 60 feet of it. Doing so destroys the cannon and forces each creature within 20 feet of it to make a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC, taking 3d10 Force damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Ghallanda Troubleshooter.name: Ghallanda Troubleshooter
Ghallanda Troubleshooter.description: The inns of House Ghallanda are meant to be places of safe refuge and quiet rest, so the house employs troubleshooters (mostly halflings) to protect the safety and serenity of its guests.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The troubleshooter casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

1/Day Each: [[/item .qxPnz8f2orpyeL5t]]{Sleep}, [[/item .vy0odJdBJMnIfnCd]]{Unseen Servant}

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The troubleshooter makes two [[/item Poisoned Dagger]] attacks.

Poisoned Dagger.name: Poisoned Dagger
Poisoned Dagger.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the troubleshooter’s next turn.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the troubleshooter’s next turn.

Leather Armor.name: 皮甲
Leather Armor.description: 该护甲的护胸和护肩由通过油煮硬化的皮子制成。护甲的其余部分则由更软更灵活的材料制作。

Hustle.name: Hustle
Hustle.description: The troubleshooter can move through the space of any creature that is of a larger size, but it can’t stop there.

Sleep.name: 睡眠术
Sleep.description:
This spell sends creatures into a magical slumber. Roll 5d8; the total is how many hit points of creatures this spell can affect. Creatures within 20 feet of a point you choose within range are affected in ascending order of their current hit points (ignoring unconscious creatures).

Starting with the creature that has the lowest current hit points, each creature affected by this spell falls &Reference[unconscious] until the spell ends, the sleeper takes damage, or someone uses an action to shake or slap the sleeper awake. Subtract each creature's hit points from the total before moving on to the creature with the next lowest hit points. A creature's hit points must be equal to or less than the remaining total for that creature to be affected.

Undead and creatures immune to being charmed aren't affected by this spell.

Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, roll an additional 2d8 for each slot level above 1st.

materials.value: A pinch of fine sand, rose petals, or a cricket.

Sleep.name: 睡眠术
Sleep.description: The creature affected by this spell falls Unconscious until the spell ends, the sleeper takes damage, or someone uses an action to shake or slap the sleeper awake.

Unseen Servant.name: 隐形仆役
Unseen Servant.description:
该法术创造出一个&Reference[Invisible]{隐形}、无心智、无实形的中体型力场。你可以在法术终止前命令它进行简单的任务。该仆从被创造出来后出现在施法距离内一处未被占据空间的地面上。其 AC 为 10，1 生命值，2 力量，且不能攻击。若仆从的生命值降至 0，则法术终止。

在你的每个回合内，你可以用一个附赠动作对仆役下达精神命令，使它移动至多 15 尺并与一个物件进行互动。仆从可以做人类仆从能做到的简单工作，例如拿取东西、打扫卫生、修补东西、叠衣服、点火、上菜、倒酒等。一旦你下达了命令，仆从就会尽其所能地去做你命令它做的工作直至完成，并在完成任务后静待你的下一个命令。

如果你命令仆从执行一个需要它离开你身边超过 60 尺的任务，则法术终止。

qxPnz8f2orpyeL5t.name: 睡眠术
qxPnz8f2orpyeL5t.description:
以施法距离内一点为源点，5 尺半径球状区域内每个你选择的生物都必须成功通过一次感知豁免否则直到其下个回合结束陷入&Reference[incapacitated apply=false]状态。在其下个回合结束时，它必须重复此豁免。如果目标第二次豁免失败，目标在持续时间内陷入&Reference[unconscious]如果目标受到伤害，或其 5 尺内有人用一个动作将它摇醒，目标身上的法术结束。

不会睡眠的生物，比如精灵或免疫力竭状态的生物自动成功通过对抗此法术的豁免。

Sleeping.name: 昏睡
Sleeping.description: 你直至下一回合结束前陷入&Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{失能}状态。在下一回合结束时，你必须重复此豁免。若你的豁免再次失败，你在持续时间内陷入&Reference[unconscious]{昏迷}如果你受到伤害，或其 5 尺内有人用一个动作将你摇醒，你自身上的法术结束。

vy0odJdBJMnIfnCd.name: 隐形仆役
vy0odJdBJMnIfnCd.description:
This spell creates an Invisible, mindless, shapeless, Medium force that performs simple tasks at your command until the spell ends. The servant springs into existence in an unoccupied space on the ground within range. It has AC 10, 1 Hit Point, and a Strength of 2, and it can't attack. If it drops to 0 Hit Points, the spell ends.

Once on each of your turns as a Bonus Action, you can mentally command the servant to move up to 15 feet and interact with an object. The servant can perform simple tasks that a human could do, such as fetching things, cleaning, mending, folding clothes, lighting fires, serving food, and pouring drinks. Once you give the command, the servant performs the task to the best of its ability until it completes the task, then waits for your next command.

If you command the servant to perform a task that would move it more than 60 feet away from you, the spell ends.

Nimble Escape.name: 迅捷逃逸
Nimble Escape.description: The troubleshooter takes the &Reference[Disengage] or &Reference[Hide] action.

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Claw.name: 钳击
Claw.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过中型，则其还会被双爪之一擒抱，陷入&Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: 若你的生物体型不超过中型，你将陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态 （逃脱DC 11） 。

Luring Song.name: 诱惑之歌
Luring Song.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 唱出一段魔法的旋律，歌声持续至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 对其的专注终止。

感知豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]]，歌声开始时位于源自 [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]] 尺光环区域内的所有类人生物与巨人生物。

失败：目标陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态，直至歌声结束。目标在其回合结束时重复豁免。魅惑期间，目标陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态并无视其他 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 的诱惑之歌动作。

若目标与 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 之间的距离大于 5 尺，其会在自己回合中以最直接的路径向 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 移动，尝试到达 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 5 尺内。此移动不会避免&Reference[OpportunityAttacks]；不过每当其将要移动到伤害性地形（例如岩浆或坑陷），或是每当其受到来源于魅惑其的 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 以外的伤害时，其都能重复豁免。

成功：目标在 24 小时内免疫此 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 的诱惑之歌。

Charmed & Incapacitated.name: 魅惑并失能
Charmed & Incapacitated.description:
你陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态，直至歌声结束，你在你的回合结束时重复豁免。

魅惑期间，你陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态。

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的攻击目标生物周围 5 尺范围内存在有至少一个 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 未失能的盟友，则 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 对该生物进行的攻击检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] 攻击。

Fire Breath.name: 火焰吐息
Fire Breath.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=bDqgmtLG3zcVuqdi]] 尺锥形区域内的所有生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害。

成功：半伤。

Force Strike.name: Force Strike
Force Strike.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft. Hit: 1d6 plus the spell’s level Force damage.

Channel Magic.name: Channel Magic
Channel Magic.description: Trigger: You cast a spell that has a range of touch while the homunculus is within [[lookup @range.value activity=9fNTfkxjjUHm8bfy]] feet of you. Response: The homunculus delivers the spell through its touch.

utility.condition: You cast a spell that has a range of touch while the homunculus is within 120 feet of you.

Magic Bond.name: Magic Bond
Magic Bond.description: Add the spell’s level to any ability check or saving throw the homunculus makes.

Evasion.name: 反射闪避
Evasion.description: 当 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 受到一个允许其进行敏捷豁免来只承受一半伤害的效应影响时，[[lookup @name lowercase]] 在豁免成功时不受伤害，豁免失败时只承受一半伤害。其无法在失能时使用此特质。

Force-Empowered Rend.name: Force-Empowered Rend
Force-Empowered Rend.description: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 + 2 plus your Intelligence modifier Force damage.

Repair.name: Repair
Repair.description: The defender, or one Construct or object it can see within 5 feet of itself, regains a number of Hit Points equal to 2d8 plus your Intelligence modifier.

Deflect Attack.name: Deflect Attack
Deflect Attack.description:
Trigger: A creature the defender can see within 5 feet of itself makes an attack roll against a creature other than the defender.

Response: The triggering creature makes the attack roll with Disadvantage.

Improved Defelection. Whenever your Steel Defender uses its Deflect Attack, the attacker takes Force damage equal to 1d4 plus your Intelligence modifier.

Steel Bond.name: Steel Bond
Steel Bond.description: Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the defender makes.

Jorasco Medic.name: Jorasco Medic
Jorasco Medic.description: Dragonmarked heirs of House Jorasco served alongside every nation’s armies in the Last War, providing medical care and magical healing to the injured. Though the warring nations treated Jorasco medics as sacrosanct, these medics also learned to channel their healing power into dazzling light to help them reach the wounded and escape from the thick of combat when necessary.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The medic makes two [[/item Radiant Burst]] attacks.

Radiant Burst.name: 圣光爆发
Radiant Burst.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the creature has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the start of the medic’s next turn.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: The creature has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the start of the medic’s next turn.

Mark of Healing.name: Mark of Healing
Mark of Healing.description: The medic casts [[/item .rfkPvLaL9OCFKgxa]]{Cure Wounds} or [[/item .jFU4SE5b8MhqaRqb]]{Lesser Restoration}, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

Lucky.name: 幸运
Lucky.description:
When the medic rolls a 1 on the d20 of a D20 Test, it can reroll the die, and it must use the new roll.

Foundry Note

An Active Effect (AE) is enabled on this feature that will reroll any 1 of a d20 test.

Breastplate.name: 胸甲
Breastplate.description: 该护甲主要由皮条固定的金属护胸组成。尽管它并没有为四肢提供额外的防护，但其在保证着装者活动自由度的同时，为其生命器官提供了十分有效的保护效果。

Cure Wounds.name: 疗伤术
Cure Wounds.description:
你触碰的一名生物恢复等同于 2d8 + 你施法属性调整值点生命值。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，治疗量就增加 2d8 点。

Lesser Restoration.name: Lesser Restoration
Lesser Restoration.description: 你触碰一个生物，并终止正影响它的一种状态：&Reference[blinded]、&Reference[deafened]、&Reference[paralyzed] 或 &Reference[poisoned]。

Kundarak Warden.name: Kundarak Warden
Kundarak Warden.description: Some dragonmarked heirs (mostly dwarves) of House Kundarak serve as personal guardians for the house’s vaults and storehouses, and even its infamous prison, Dreadhold. Some also serve as agents of the mysterious Ghorad’din, a secretive group of assassins and spies little known beyond the members of the house. Kundarak wardens are adept at bypassing security measures as well as reinforcing them.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The warden casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: [[/item .UDa7WehTm2DF2TbH]]{Alarm}, [[/item .cTq3jido58RQZDVn]]{Mage Armor} (included in AC)

1/Day: [[/item .NSshbfvPXXeYlep3]]{Dispel Magic}

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The warden makes two [[/item Arcane Whip]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item Shackling Glyph]] if available.

Arcane Whip.name: Arcane Whip
Arcane Whip.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

If the target already has the Prone condition, the attack deals an extra [[/damage 2d6 force average]] damage.

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: A Medium or smaller creature is &Reference[Prone apply=false] as a result of an attack.

Shackling Glyph.name: Shackling Glyph
Shackling Glyph.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]], one creature the warden can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=AKdmrcN2he98aia7]] feet.

Failure: The creature has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 14). While Grappled, the creature has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition.

Protective Magic.name: 护身魔法
Protective Magic.description: The warden casts [[/item .JIGhDMyr2mnf8OMW]]{Counterspell} or [[/item .MWDCLYm2xEVNc14M]]{Shield} in response to the spell’s trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

5497nQlLbmso17bG.condition: 当你被攻击命中或被作为魔法飞弹法术的目标时执行

HWGCOoCcLpnW3FbA.condition: 当你看见范围内一名生物施展一道法术时执行

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: The warden has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Alarm.name: 警报术
Alarm.description:
你设置一个针对不速之客的警报。在施法距离内指定一扇门窗或选择一个边长不大于 20 尺的立方区域。在法术持续时间内，任何触碰或进入被法术保护区域的生物都会触发警报。施法时，你可以决定哪些生物不会触发警报，还可以选择警报方式为声音警报或是精神警报。

声音警报。警报将在其保护区域 60 尺范围内将响起持续 10 秒摇铃声。

精神警报。如果你距离目标区域不超过 1 里，警报会在你脑海中会传来“乒”的警报声。如果你在睡觉，则警报将使你惊醒。

materials.value: 一个小铃铛和一小段银线

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你触碰一个未着装护甲的自愿生物。直至法术终止前，目标的基础AC变为 13 + 它的敏捷调整值。当目标穿上护甲时，此法术将提前终止。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Shield.name: 护盾术
Shield.description: An imperceptible barrier of magical force protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}.

activation.condition: 当你被攻击命中或被作为魔法飞弹法术的目标时执行

Imperceptible Barrier.name: 无形护盾
Imperceptible Barrier.description: 在你的下一回合开始前，你的 AC 具有 +5 加值（在触发该法术的攻击之前生效），并且不会受 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi] 的伤害。

Counterspell.name: 法术反制
Counterspell.description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. The creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.

activation.condition: 当你看见范围内一名生物施展一道法术时执行

Kuo-toa.name: 寇涛
Kuo-toa.description:
装备：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepSpear00000]{矛}

寇涛

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.5cWxPFYWZSjJw6ih caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

寇涛

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.XEDbrbc4fOsasH55 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Spear.name: 矛
Spear.description: 近战或远程攻击检定：+3 触及 5 尺或射程 20/60 尺。命中：5（1d8+1）穿刺伤害。

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 身处阳光下，其进行的属性检定和攻击检定具有劣势。

Sticky Shield.name: 粘性盾牌
Sticky Shield.description:
触发：一名生物以武器进行的近战攻击检定对[[lookup @name lowercase]]失手。响应—力量豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=A8a55LxaAvNmIUnj]], 触发生物。

失败：攻击者的该武器粘在[[lookup @name lowercase]]的盾牌上。若目标不放开武器，则该武器被粘住期间目标陷入（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。该武器被粘住期间无法被使用。目标能够以动作进行一次 [[/check ath dc=@skills.ath.passive format=long]]检定，成功则该武器被解放。

Save.name: 豁免
Save.condition: 一名生物以武器进行的近战攻击检定对寇涛失手。

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: 若你不放开武器，则该武器被粘住期间你陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC 11，[[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]）。该武器被粘住期间无法被使用。你能够以动作进行一次 [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]检定，成功则该武器被解放。

Sticky Net.name: 粘性捕网
Sticky Net.description:
敏捷豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.formula activity=MxEs7KnCVGemObHx]], 单一 [[lookup @range.value activity=MxEs7KnCVGemObHx]] 尺内 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 可见的[[lookup @target.affects.special activity=MxEs7KnCVGemObHx]]的生物。

失败： 目标陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态直到该捕网被破坏（AC 10；HP 5；免疫钝击，毒素和心灵伤害）。一名生物可以执行动作以进行一次 [[/skill ath 10]]检定来尝试解救自身或位于自身 5 尺内困在捕网中的其他生物，成功则摧毁捕网。

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false 状态直到该捕网被破坏（AC 10，HP 5；免疫钝击，毒素和心灵伤害）。一名生物可以执行动作以进行一次DC 10 的力量（运动）检定，若成功，则可以破坏捕网，将自己或 5 尺之内困在捕网中的其他生物解救出来。

Kuo-toa Archpriest.name: 寇涛大祭司
Kuo-toa Archpriest.description:
寇涛

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.5cWxPFYWZSjJw6ih caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

寇涛大祭司

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.jVLHLrDcjEGUhZmp caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 身处阳光下，其进行的属性检定和攻击检定具有劣势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动三次 [[/item .mmStrangeScepter]] 攻击。

Strange Scepter.name: 怪异圣杖
Strange Scepter.description: 近战或远程攻击检定：[[/attack]]，触及 [[lookup @item.range.reach]] 尺。或射程 [[lookup @item.range.value]]尺。[[/damage average extended]]。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]]施展以下一道法术，无需任何材料成分并使用感知作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]

每项1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDestructiv], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDivination], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHoldMonste]（6 环版本）, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplScrying000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTongues000]

Detect Magic.name: 侦测魔法
Detect Magic.description:
在法术持续时间内，你感受到距你 30 尺内的魔法效应。若你感知到了此类效应，则你可以用一个魔法动作以看到任何带有此魔法的可见生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，且若此魔法属于被法术创造的效应，则你可分辨出其所属的魔法学派。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内显现一道次级奇迹。你在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的持续 1 分钟的效应。

改变眼睛。 你改变自己眼睛的外观，其效应持续 1 分钟。

扩音。 你的声音变为一般时候的三倍，其效应持续 1 分钟。在此期间，你在 [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] 检定上具有优势。

玩火。 你使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色，其效应持续 1 分钟。

无形之手。 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗立即打开或关上。

幻音。 你使一阵瞬时声音自施法距离内一点发出，例如雷鸣声，渡鸦叫声或不祥低语声。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

Destructive Wave.name: 湮灭波
Destructive Wave.description: 毁灭能量从你身上扩散而出，覆盖了 30 尺光环范围。光环范围内你选择的每个生物进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败者受到 5d6 点雷鸣伤害和 5d6 点光耀或暗蚀伤害（由你选择）并且陷入 &Reference[Prone] 状态。豁免成功只受一半伤害。

Divination.name: 预言术
Divination.description:
此法术让你得以与一名神祇或其仆人取得联络。你可以就某个未来 7 日内将要发生的特定目标、事件或活动提出一个问题。DM将给予你真实的答复，这个答复可能是一段短语或一节神秘的短诗。此法术的回答并不会顾及所有可能影响结果的情况。比如其他法术的影响。

若你在完成一次长休之前施展多于一次该法术，则法术有概率不给出任何结果。此概率从第二次施展起每次累计 25％。

materials.value: 价值 25+GP 的熏香，作为法术耗材

Hold Monster.name: 定身怪物
Hold Monster.description:
指定施法距离内一个你能看见的生物。该目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则其在法术持续时间内陷入麻痹状态。目标在其每回合结束时可以重新进行这次豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上该法术的效应。

升环施法： 使用六环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比五环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你在每回合结束时可以重新进行[[/save ability=wis]]豁免，豁免成功则终止你身上该法术的效应。

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

materials.value: 一个至少价值 1000GP 的法器，例如水晶球、银镜、圣水盆

affects.special: 与你处于同一位面的生物，或某个你曾见过的地点的生物

Tongues.name: 巧言术
Tongues.description: 此法术赋予你触碰的一名生物理解任何其能看见或听见的口语或手语的能力。此外，当目标生物以口语或手语进行交流时，任何能听见其话语或看见其手语，且知道至少一门语言的生物都能理解它。

Shield of Faith.name: 虔诚护盾
Shield of Faith.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShieldofFa]，并使用与施法动作相同的施法属性。

T5upgFch5zEBoWTj.name: 虔诚护盾
T5upgFch5zEBoWTj.description: 一片闪着微光的魔法力场围绕着施法距离内你指定的一个生物，使目标在法术持续时间内 AC 获得+2 加值。

Shimmering Field.name: 微光力场
Shimmering Field.description: 你在法术持续时间内 AC 获得+2 加值。

Kuo-toa Monitor.name: 寇涛监察者
Kuo-toa Monitor.description:
寇涛

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.5cWxPFYWZSjJw6ih caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

寇涛监察者

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.N6Prinvb9ppnSZub caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 身处阳光下，其进行的属性检定和攻击检定具有劣势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmBoneWhip000000p]] 攻击。

Bone Whip.name: 骨鞭
Bone Whip.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，且直至[[lookup @name lowercase]]的下一回合开始，目标无法发动&Reference[OpportunityAttacks]。

Whipped: No Opportunity Attacks.name: 骨鞭：无法借机
Whipped: No Opportunity Attacks.description: 你无法发动&Reference[OpportunityAttacks]，直至寇涛监察者的下一回合开始。

Kuo-toa Whip.name: 寇涛驱策者
Kuo-toa Whip.description:
寇涛

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.5cWxPFYWZSjJw6ih caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

寇涛驱策者

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.VEYcunqNbjyhHOwB caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 身处阳光下，其进行的属性检定和攻击检定具有劣势。

Pincer Staff.name: 钳杖
Pincer Staff.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过中型，则其陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。且 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 无法再次发动钳杖攻击，直至擒抱结束。

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: 若你的生物体型不超过中型，则陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC 12， [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]）。且寇涛驱策者无法再次发动钳杖攻击，直至擒抱结束。

Shield of Faith.name: 虔诚护盾
Shield of Faith.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShieldofFa]，并使用与施法动作相同的施法属性。

CqajRrRLSFDDOQPA.name: 虔诚护盾
CqajRrRLSFDDOQPA.description: 一片闪着微光的魔法力场围绕着施法距离内你指定的一个生物，使目标在法术持续时间内 AC 获得+2 加值。

Shimmering Field.name: 微光力场
Shimmering Field.description: 你在法术持续时间内 AC 获得+2 加值。

Lyrandar Scion.name: Lyrandar Scion
Lyrandar Scion.description:
The Khoravar dragonmarked scions of House Lyrandar include swashbuckling sky captains, seafaring adventurers, and sinister cultists of the Hurricane Harvest. The power of their dragonmarks manifests as easy control of wind, thunder, and lightning, which they wield as readily in combat as in navigating the sea and sky.

Members of the Hurricane Harvest believe that the Mark of Storm is not a gift of the Sovereign Host, as others in their house teach, but the sign of the Devourer. They maintain that the greatest ancestors of their house live on as krakens in the deep and guide the cult through visions to use their power for destruction and domination. They sometimes partner with kuo-toa, sahuagin, and other monsters of the deep.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The scion casts one of the following spells, using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: [[/item .OwVGuITv8TXK8ten]], [[/item .MBjAgryxkHJ4lL2B]], [[/item .wsF4CKDc6u92qlzV]]

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The scion makes two [[/item Thunderbolt]] attacks and uses [[/item Spellcasting]].

Thunderbolt.name: 雷霆轰击
Thunderbolt.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

Critical Hit: The creature also has the &Reference[Deafened apply=false] condition for 1 minute.

Jump.name: 跳跃术
Jump.description: The scion casts [[/item .KcXB2hCdh3VPjZre]], requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Feather Fall.name: 羽落术
Feather Fall.description: The scion casts [[/item .HHMxLkIveTBXjqO7]] in response to that spell’s trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Wand.name: 魔杖
Wand.description: An @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{Arcane Focus} is bejeweled or carved to channel arcane magic. A Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.

Elementalism.name: 四象法门
Elementalism.description:
你操控元素，在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。

召气。 你在 5 尺立方范围内创造一股足以吹动布料，搅动灰尘，使落叶沙沙作响，关闭打开的门和百叶窗的和风。若打开的门或百叶窗被某人或某物顶住，则其不受该效应影响。

召土。 你创造灰尘或沙子组成的薄帷，覆盖在 5 尺方状区域内的表面上，或者你可以在一堆泥土或沙子中使一个单词以你的手写体出现。

召火。 你在 5 尺立方范围内创造一片无害余烬与一股富有色彩和气味的烟。你选择烟的色彩和气味，而余烬可以点燃区域中的蜡烛、火把或油灯。烟的气味会存留 1 分钟。

召水。 你在 5 尺立方范围内创造一片凉爽的，使范围内生物和物件略微潮湿的雾气。或者，你可以在一个打开的容器或表面上创造一杯干净的水，水会在 1 分钟内蒸发。

塑形元素。 你使 1 尺立方区域内的泥土、沙子、火焰、烟尘、雾气或水呈现出一个粗略的形状（如一名生物），持续 1 小时。

Beckon Element.name: 召唤元素
Beckon Element.chatFlavor: 水、火召唤效果持续 1 分钟。

Gust of Wind.name: 造风术
Gust of Wind.description:
一股长 60 尺，宽 10 尺的线状强风从你吹向你指定的方向。每名位于线状区域内的生物必须成功于一次力量豁免，豁免失败则沿着线状的方向被推离你 15 尺。在线状区域内结束其回合的生物也必须进行同样的豁免。

任何生物在线状区域内朝更靠近你的方向移动时，其每移动 1 尺必须花费 2 尺的移动力。

强风吹散区域内的毒气或蒸汽，并吹熄蜡烛等不受保护的其他类似火焰。而有保护的火焰（比如提灯）则会剧烈摇晃并有 50% 的机率被吹熄。

你可以在自己随后的回合内用一个附赠动作改变线状风道的方向。

Thunderwave.name: 雷鸣波
Thunderwave.description:
你施放出一道雷鸣能量。在以你为源点 15 尺立方区域内的每名生物必须进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败者将受到 2d8 点雷鸣伤害，并被推离 10 尺。豁免成功则只受一半伤害。

此外，所有完全位于该区域内且未被固定住的物件都将被推离 10 尺。该法术还会发出距你 300 尺内都能听见的雷霆巨响。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，伤害就提高 1d8。

HHMxLkIveTBXjqO7.name: 羽落术
HHMxLkIveTBXjqO7.description: 指定施法距离内至多五个正坠落的生物。受术生物的坠落速度在法术持续时间内降低至每回合 60 尺。如果该生物在法术终止前落地，则其不会受到任何坠落伤害，且着地后法术对该生物的效应随即终止。

activation.condition: 你或距你 60 尺内的可见生物坠落时可用

KcXB2hCdh3VPjZre.name: 跳跃术
KcXB2hCdh3VPjZre.description:
你触碰一个自愿生物。在法术结束前，每个他的回合内一次该生物可以消耗 10 尺移动力来跳跃 30 尺。

升环施法： 使用二环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Jump.name: 跳跃术
Jump.description: 在法术结束前，每个你的回合内一次该生物可以消耗 10 尺移动力来跳跃 30 尺。

Shield Station.name: Shield Station
Shield Station.description:
Large Object

Armor Class: [[lookup @item.armor.value]] Hit Points: [[lookup @item.hp.max]]

Calibrate (Requires Elemental Core). This action prepares the ship’s wind wards to become shields, enabling the Activate Shields action.

Activate Shields (Requires Elemental Core and Calibrate). The ship and its crew stations gain a +5 bonus to AC, and all creatures on the ship’s deck have &Reference[Half Cover]. These effects last for 1 minute, until this station is destroyed, or until the crew member that took this action loses Concentration or leaves this station.

This station is located on the airship’s aft controls and augments the ship’s wind wards. It can accommodate up to two Medium creatures.

The crew member operating this station can take the Calibrate action and then take the Activate Shields action. The ship can benefit from only one bonus to AC from a Shield Station at a time.

Mark of Warding. If a creature with the Mark of Warding occupies this crew station, that creature can take the Activate Shields action as a Bonus Action.

Foundry Note

An Active Effect (AE) is available to enable in the Effects tab to add the +5 bonus to the sheet.

affects.special: the airship and all creatures on the ship's deck

Half-Cover.name: Half-Cover
Half-Cover.description: All creatures on the ship’s deck have &Reference[Half Cover].

Helm.name: 头盔
Helm.description:
Small Object

Armor Class: [[lookup @item.armor.value]] Hit Points: [[lookup @item.hp.max]]

Drive (Requires Mark of Storm). The ship moves up to its Fly Speed in any direction.

Shift Engine (Requires Mark of Storm). The ship’s elemental core is suppressed or reengaged.

The helm of an airship consists of a specialized wheel, levers, and other controls. One creature can operate this station at a time.

The pilot (the crew member operating an airship’s Helm) must have the Mark of Storm to interface with the controls. While operating the Helm, a crew member can take the station’s Drive and Shift Engine actions.

Tilt and Roll. When taking the Helm’s Drive action, a crew member can spend an amount of movement equal to half the ship’s Fly Speed to invert the ship on its axis, either turning it upside down or righting it. All creatures and objects on the ship that aren’t anchored fall when the ship moves in this way. A creature that succeeds on a [[/save format=long]] can grab a fixed object within reach to avoid falling.

Piloting without a Dragonmark

Helming an airship that typically requires a dragonmarked pilot is difficult—but not impossible. At your DM’s discretion, you can use the following rules for piloting a ship without a dragonmark.

On its turn, a creature without the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-forge-artificer.options.Item.efaMarkStorm0000]{Mark of Storm} occupying the Helm can attempt to take the Drive or Shift Engine action and make a [[/check]] check to command the engine’s elemental spirit. On a successful check, the action happens. On a failed check, nothing happens, and the creature’s action is wasted.

Magic can make an airship’s elemental spirit more receptive to commands. Casting @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmMonst]{Charm Monster} targeting the elemental spirit gives you Advantage on checks made to command the spirit for the spell’s duration. If you instead cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDominateMo]{Dominate Monster} targeting the elemental spirit, any checks you make to command the spirit for the spell’s duration automatically succeed. The elemental spirit automatically fails its saving throw against these spells, and you do not need to see the spirit to target it if you’re occupying the Helm.

Attempt Command.name: Attempt Command
Attempt Command.condition: As part of the Action used to take the Drive or Shift action.

Tilt and Roll.name: Tilt and Roll
Tilt and Roll.condition: Taking the Drive action and spending half of the ship's Fly Speed

Lightning Turret.name: Lightning Turret
Lightning Turret.description:
Medium Object

Armor Class: [[lookup @item.armor.value]] Hit Points: [[lookup @item.hp.max]]

Lightning Blast (Requires Elemental Core). [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

This turret swivels to shoot lightning blasts and can accommodate up to one Medium creature.

A creature inside the turret has Three-Quarters Cover against attacks and other effects that originate outside it. While inside, a creature can take the Lightning Blast action to aim and fire the turret.

Tow Cable.name: Tow Cable
Tow Cable.description:
Small Object

Armor Class: [[lookup @item.armor.value]] Hit Points: [[lookup @item.hp.max]]

Harpoon. [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target is harpooned. While harpooned, the target and the ship can’t move more than 100 feet away from each other, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled] condition. The crew member operating this station can release a harpooned target (no action required).

Reel (Requires Elemental Core). A target Grappled by this station’s Harpoon is pulled up to 50 feet in a straight line toward the ship.

This station consists of a compact grappling hook, reinforced rope, and launcher. One creature can operate this station at a time. The crew member operating this station can take the Harpoon and Reel actions.

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is &Reference[Grappled apply=false].

Helm.name: 头盔
Helm.description:
Small Object

Armor Class: [[lookup @item.armor.value]] Hit Points: [[lookup @item.hp.max]]

Drive (Requires Mark of Storm). The ship moves up to its Fly Speed in any direction.

Shift Engine (Requires Mark of Storm). The ship’s elemental core is suppressed or reengaged.

The helm of an airship consists of a specialized wheel, levers, and other controls. One creature can operate this station at a time.

The pilot (the crew member operating an airship’s Helm) must have the Mark of Storm to interface with the controls. While operating the Helm, a crew member can take the station’s Drive and Shift Engine actions.

When taking the Helm’s Drive action, a crew member can spend an amount of movement equal to half the ship’s Fly Speed to invert the ship on its axis, either turning it upside down or righting it. All creatures and objects on the ship that aren’t anchored fall when the ship moves in this way. A creature that succeeds on a [[/save format=long]] can grab a fixed object within reach to avoid falling.
